DECLARE @ERROR_SEQ INT
SET @ERROR_SEQ = NEXT VALUE FOR ERROR_SEQ
INSERT INTO MES_WEB_ERROR_LOG (ERROR_NO, MENU_ID, QUERY_ID, ERROR_LOG, REGIST_DATE) VALUES (@ERROR_SEQ, #MENU_ID#, #QUERY_ID#, #ERROR_LOG#, GETDATE())

SELECT ERROR_NO , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM MES_MENU_MA AS MM WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE MM.MENU_ID = A.MENU_ID) AS MENU_NM , QUERY_ID , ERROR_LOG , REGIST_DATE FROM ( SELECT ERROR_NO , MENU_ID , QUERY_ID , ERROR_LOG , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), REGIST_DATE, 121) AS REGIST_DATE , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), REGIST_DATE, 112) AS CONVERT_REGIST_DATE FROM MES_WEB_ERROR_LOG WITH(NOLOCK) ) A WHERE CONVERT_REGIST_DATE BETWEEN #SDATE# AND #EDATE# AND MENU_ID = (CASE WHEN #MENU_ID# = '' THEN MENU_ID ELSE #MENU_ID# END )

SELECT ERROR_NO , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM MES_MENU_MA AS MM WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE MM.MENU_ID = CL.MENU_ID) AS MENU_NM , QUERY_ID , ERROR_LOG , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), REGIST_DATE, 121) AS REGIST_DATE FROM MES_WEB_ERROR_LOG AS CL WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ERROR_NO = #ERROR_NO#
